name: waudio
description: Javascript Web Audio drop-in replacement for Audio

scripts.build:
COPYRIGHT='(c) 2017, Aditya Ravi Shankar (www.adityaravishankar.com)' && VERSION=`printf 'v' n&& node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'` && uglifyjs --preamble "/* wAudio.js $VERSION | $COPYRIGHT | MIT License */" src/wAudio.js -c -m --screw-ie8 -o dist/wAudio.min.js && echo "/*
 * wAudio.js $VERSION
 * https://github.com/adityaravishankar/wAudio.js
 *
 * $COPYRIGHT
 *
 * MIT License
 *
 */
" > dist/wAudio.js && cat src/wAudio.js >> dist/wAudio.js

author: Aditya Ravi Shankar
